caption.p: Screenshot of the online tool used for the prediction of COVID-19 infection. This tool uses the inputted variables of patients (left) to predict the risk of COVID-19 (right). The figure shows the inputted variables for a 62-year-old patient with a lymphocyte percentage of 0.23 and a monocyte count of 0.48 Ã—10 9/L ( https://bjdth.shinyapps.io/COVID-19/).
